rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to the living areas and private gym. Designed with modern aesthetics and Vastu-compliant orientation.
Spacious open-plan area with access to an adjoining balcony. The layout is designed for relaxation and socializing, incorporating natural lighting aligned with Vastu principles.
Modern dining area integrated within the living space, encouraging family interactions while respecting Vastu guidelines.
Contemporary kitchen design with efficient workflow and storage solutions. Vastu compliant location for prosperity.
State-of-the-art private gym designed with ample space and ventilation. Located in a quiet area of the villa per Vastu recommendations for activity and energy.
Elegant master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Oriented to ensure restful sleep per Vastu guidelines.
Two additional bedrooms designed for flexibility and privacy. Each room follows a contemporary style with functional storage.
A multi-functional space serving as an additional living area and study. Vastu aligned for knowledge and creativity.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned in accordance with Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
Large windows to enhance natural lighting and ventilation. Placed to align with Vastu principles.
Door openings leading to balconies for outdoor access, in keeping with modern design and Vastu harmony.
